meanings.definition: A person who enjoys eating and often eats large amounts of food.
meanings.sent1: The gourmands at the party couldn't resist trying every dish on the buffet table.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a true gourmands, always eager to explore new restaurants and cuisines.
meanings.sent3: The gourmands joked that they needed a bigger table to fit all the food they wanted to try.
meanings.sent4: Her appetite was like that of a gourmands, insatiable and always seeking new flavors.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gourmands devouring the feast lingered in my mind long after the party ended.

meanings.definition: A person who is excessively fond of eating and drinking.
meanings.sent1: The gourmands in our group always knew the best places to eat and drink.
meanings.sent2: As a gourmands, he took great pleasure in savoring every bite of the decadent dessert.
meanings.sent3: The gourmands chuckled as they compared notes on their favorite indulgent treats.
meanings.sent4: Her love for food and drink was so intense, she was known as the gourmands of the family.
meanings.sent5: The gourmands' eyes lit up at the sight of the lavish banquet spread before them.
